channel.title: SimBus on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in SimBus on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Simulation Transports
item.description: Overview A Simulation Transport specifies how data-exchange between Models is facilitated by a simulation environment. Each transport has its own specific properties and the selection of a transport will be determined by the planned operational deployment of a simulation. Transport Latency Status Loopback Fastest Available, stacked simulations (single process). TCP Fastest Planned. Redis Faster Recommended. Redis PubSub Fast Available, stable. RESP Fast Under consideration, for cloud connectivity (tunnelling). gPPC Fast Under consideration, for cloud connectivity (HTTP).
